title: What can I do if my Y536A1 phone runs out of power quickly?
answer:
l   Turn on power saving mode. Go to **Settings**, touch **Power saving**, and select a power saving mode or close power-intensive applications.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141021064742362001.png)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141021064743901002.png)

l   Turn off the screen when you aren't using your phone.

l   Reduce the screen timeout period. 

l   Reduce the screen brightness.

l   Reduce the volume.

<font face="Tahoma"> l   Turn off your mobile network, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, or GPS from the notification panel when you aren't using them </font>
